issue.title: [R] Adapt to latest checks in R-devel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8188](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8188). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://github.com/ursa-labs/crossbow/runs/526813242 for example.

1. checkbashisms now is complaining about a few things
2. Latest R-devel actually runs the donttest examples with --as-cran, and one fails.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8188?focusedCommentId=17065171) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6692
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6692>
